name: Visit the Gergeti Trinity Church
description: Explore the iconic Gergeti Trinity Church, set against the stunning backdrop of Mount Kazbek.

name: Wine Tasting in Kakheti
description: Experience the rich wine-making tradition of Kakheti, the heart of Georgia's wine country.

name: Explore Tbilisi's Old Town
description: Wander through the narrow streets of Tbilisi's Old Town, brimming with history and charm.

name: Batumi Botanical Garden
description: Visit one of the largest botanical gardens in the former Soviet Union, located in Batumi.

name: Uplistsikhe Cave Town
description: Discover the ancient rock-hewn town of Uplistsikhe, dating back to the early Iron Age.

name: Svetitskhoveli Cathedral
description: Visit the historic Svetitskhoveli Cathedral in Mtskheta, a masterpiece of the Early Middle Ages.

name: Prometheus Cave Tour
description: Explore the stunning Prometheus Cave, known for its breathtaking stalactites and stalagmites.

name: Visit Ananuri Fortress
description: Explore the medieval Ananuri Fortress, located along the Aragvi River.

name: Vardzia Cave Monastery
description: Discover the impressive Vardzia Cave Monastery, a remarkable example of medieval Georgian architecture.

name: Borjomi Central Park
description: Relax in the scenic Borjomi Central Park, famous for its mineral water springs and natural beauty.
